directions: Arrange two banana halves in each of 4 ice cream dishes. Top each with three scoops ice cream.
Sprinkle with chopped Butterfinger, then drizzle with Nesquik.
Top with whipped cream and a cherry. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 bananas, ripe, peeled, and halved lengthwise
12 pieces NESTLE® BUTTERFINGER® Bites Candy, chopped, or more if desired
title: Butterfinger Banana Split
